content.description: Which version of the underlined text in sentence 8 (reproduced below) provides commentary that logically connects to the evidence in the paragraph?
content.question: Governments can forge alliances between countries, but the particular officials charged with doing so vary from country to country.

choices.label: people often have to travel abroad to truly understand what it is like in other countries
their ability to do so can be constrained by economic conditions and other factors
these acts do not necessarily encourage feelings of closeness between the countries’ citizens

content.answer: these acts do not necessarily encourage feelings of closeness between the countries’ citizens

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
